creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: large mountain with many levels and boulders and flat, sloping surfaces at upper center; small, "terraced" waterfall at LL; figure in small house on stilts seated overlooking water; cluster of trees and boulders at R; a few brown highlights
inscription: URC: [ 秋山讀易 ] {Shuzan Tokueki} (Reading I-Ching in the Autumn woods)
markings: URC: [Kan ? Ga kaku]; [Hakumei shi]; LLC: [Ie baika chikuju no mura ni ari(?)]
signed: URC: [ 竹洞山人写 ] (Chikuto Sanjin sha)
title: Reading I-Ching in the Autumn Woods
